amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Nuclear Energy by $75 million and to zero out funding for Nuclear Waste Disposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Nuclear Energy by $75 million and to zero out funding for Nuclear Waste Disposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (NV) amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
